name: Room Shift (BlockedNickel)
description:
You the Human have been give the magical power to rotate the world around you. Help the character escape in this puzzle platformer. You are limited to one chance so no mistakes.

Controls; A,D to move left and right. W or Space to jump.  Q and E to rotate. S to enter doors while over them

***Game only has three levels I was kinda lazy and didn't start until  the last day of the jam***

Assets:

https://0x72.itch.io/16x16-robot-tileset

https://pzuh.itch.io/free-sci-fi-platformer-tileset
